name: Pandora Project: The Logic Master
overview: Pandora Project: The Logic Master is set in a distant future where the police can't fight against the evil robots that are causing trouble in the city, and that's where the player's character appear since he's a robot designer and will use his creations to battle the evil robots. The game is about designing those robots using the game editor, there the player can choose what are the actions and different things that his robot will use in the battles. After designing the player can train his robot or take it to battle against other robots in the event battle (story mode) or in the vs battle against another player robot.
